GeneDef.Name: WVC_XenotypesAndGenes_GeneHivemind_Sync
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Affects <color=#8a8ae6>all owners</color> of any gene of the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> series. <color=#8a8ae6>Psy-deaf</color> pawns are ignored.
<color=#8a8ae6>Efficiency</color> of sync- depends on the <color=#8a8ae6>size</color> of the <color=#8a8ae6>hive</color>.
